title: Spring Security
description: A simple SpringBoot app that implements jwt tokens to protect internal api and allows user to login with Google or Facebook. You can find a SpringBoot app which implements OAUTH at my github repository

title: Movie Review app
description: A movie review app that allows users to register and add reviews to movies. The front-end for the website is uses ReactJs and the backend is created using SpringBoot. Please refer to my github movie_review_backend repo for full fledged application.

title: Huffman Encoder
description: A simple encoder that uses HuffMan algorithm to encode each bits of a String to achieve loseless compression. This project takes advantage of OOPS in JavaScript. Please refer to huffman_encoder_backend for full application

title: E-Commerce App
description: An e-commerce Shopping app that allows users to add clothing items to cart. This website uses ReactJs in composition with React-Redux to manage the state of the application

title: Todo App
description: A todo app that allows users to add tasks and mark them as completed. This application also used Googles' Login api to create an user and store the user info in Firebase database.

title: Covid-19 Tracker
description: A simple covid-19 tracker that allows users to track the number of cases in a particular country. This application uses ExpressJs to create a server and fetches data from an external API
